items.title: Editor's note: Reporting the midair collision will focus on facts and people's stories
items.description: NPR's reporting will continue to focus on what happened and learning what we can about the victims and telling their stories.

items.title: Going to weddings and birthdays can be pricey. How to cut costs or gracefully decline
items.description: If your social calendar is burning a hole in your wallet, there are steps you can take to spend less while maintaining good relationships.
